divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home when I saw a bright star I kept staring at it and it was moving slow I knew it wasn't a plane because there was no blinking light or sound It wasn't to far away but wasn't close either I've never seen anything like it. It was moving south then went south west and I couldn't see it anymore. It had no smoke trail like a jet or sound it looked like a big star just cruising.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Goleta
There were no other sightings in Goleta on or around October 8th 2008
